text: I have this CxxWrap-based package, and often I change something in the bindings, build it again, install it again and seem to get the old package still in my julia environment. Just `rm` the package and installing again doesn't seem to solve it. How do I ensure I removed any trace of the old package and that I'm using the new one?

elements.text: I have this CxxWrap-based package, and often I change something in the bindings, build it again, install it again and seem to get the old package still in my julia environment. Just
the package and installing again doesn't seem to solve it. How do I ensure I removed any trace of the old package and that I'm using the new one?

text: Did you try deleting it entirely from your .julia/packages folder?

elements.text: Did you try deleting it entirely from your .julia/packages folder?
